title: 1 Bed/1 Bath Modern Beltline Apartment
posting_body: ['Hello!', "I'm moving out of this awesome apartment because I purchased a home.", 'Looking for someone to take over the remainder of my lease which goes until March 8th.', 'Move in as early as August.', 'Perfect for someone new to Atlanta, looking for temporary housing (travel nurse/househunting) or wants to get in a coveted building at a good price and you can absolutely renew in March.', 'About the apartment:', '-1 bedroom with window fits a king bed', '-1 spacious bathroom with walk in closet and stacked washer/dryer in separate closet', '-Open floorplan kitchen with granite and modern cabinets, appliances and lighting', '-Contemporary living area with big windows for natural sunlight and a nice view', '-Spacious balcony that overlooks the sun deck and the beltline', '-Walking distance to Fetch Dog Park, bars, restaurants, Krogg Street Market, Ponce City Market, Piedmont Park', '-Windows & walls are thick, I never hear my neighbors.', 'Rent is $1,999/mo plus fees for trash, fetch package delivery & utilities.', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', 'Direct Access to the Beltline Eastside Trail', 'Heated Resort-Style Pool', 'Tropical Oasis Courtyard', 'Available Storage Units', 'Office Pods Available for Lease', 'Onsite Restaurants Like Shake Shack and Cold Beer', 'Outdoor Lounge Overlooking the Beltline', '24-Hour Fitness Center', 'Pet Spa', 'Package Room', 'Clubroom with Flat Screen TVs, Kitchenette & Lounge Area', 'Private Garage Parking', 'Electric Car Charging Stations', 'Bike Maintenance and Storage', 'Dog Run']
